#summary This page defines the meaning of the word "Nanoarchitecture"

= Nanoarchitecture =

There are three types of Nanoarchitectures:

== Interactional Nanoarchitectures ==

 * MVC (or MVCtl)
 * MVCb
 * MVCbCtl
 * MVCmd
 * MVCtlCmd
 * MVTsk
 * MVStoTsk

== Structural Nanoarchitectures ==

 * Ctl
 * Cmd
 * CtlCmd
 * Tsk
 * StoTsk

== Conceptual Nanoarchitectures ==

 * NoEvt
 * layer2package
